main event: A luminous, strange gray object was observed slowly moving westward over Richland, Washington for a duration of 31 hours by three witnesses.
interesting points: The object began its rise at an elevation of 12 degrees and 59 minutes at approximately 2600L,The object was described as having dark edges and being luminous,The observers noted that the object was visible over a significant time span, with its last observation at a very high altitude,It had a low altitude and unusual bright colors and was noted to be orange and gray,The sighting occurred under clear conditions with unlimited visibility.
witness description: One witness was a 19-year-old unemployed epileptic, another was a 13-year-old student, and a homemaker.
